ValidationRule.description: Validate if Customer sales org matches with user sales org
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c, OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( cgcloud__Account__c )), cgcloud__Account__r.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c <> Text( $User.cgcloud__Sales_Org__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The User and the Customer must have the same Sales Org.
